mapper.sql: id, `name`, parent_id, `type`, `path`, component, is_cache, is_link, visible, status, icon, `order`, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS id, m.`name` AS name, m.parent_id AS parent_id, m.`path` AS path, m.component AS component, m.is_cache AS is_cache, m.is_link AS is_link, m.visible AS visible, m.icon AS icon, m.`order` AS `order`, m.create_time AS create_time, m.update_time AS update_time FROM tb_menu m LEFT JOIN tb_role r ON r.mark = #{roleMark} LEFT JOIN tb_menu_role mr ON mr.role_id = r.id AND m.id = mr.menu_id WHERE mr.menu_id = m.id AND m.status = 1
